channel.title: Daniel Mathews Blog
channel.description: Thoughts on building apps, indie development, and the decentralized web.

item.title: Can we build WeChat Mini Apps using open web standards?
item.description: A specification for building mini apps that work with QR codes and open web standards.

item.title: Should I rebuild my app on Bluesky's AT Protocol?
item.description: I'm an indie developer weighing the pros and cons of rebuilding my app on Bluesky's AT Protocol.
item.author: dannyl.mathews@gmail.com (Daniel Mathews)
